title: Ben Ben You Youji Zhi Mala Xialingying
title_japanese: 笨笨悠游记之麻辣夏令营
synopsis: Happy summer vacation is here. Mom and Dad helped Coco and Benben enrolled in a summer camp. The two of them were very happy and went to participate in happily. Unexpectedly, on the first day of the summer camp, they suffered so much and had to do everything by themselves. It turned out that this was the "Little Master Summer Camp." So, Coco and Benben started a lively summer vacation in this spicy summer camp.(translated fro iqiyi)

Prequel.name: Ben Ben You Youji Zhi Chuanyue Huaxia
